externalDocs.description: Spring Boot Actuator Web API Documentation

get.summary: Get the QA review information of an uploaded dataset for a given id.
get.description: Get the QA review information of uploaded dataset for a given id.Users can get the review information of their own datasets.Admins and reviewer can get the review information for all datasets.

200.description: Found QA review information corresponding the id.

404.description: Found no QA review information corresponding the id.

post.summary: Assign a QA review status to a dataset.
post.description: Assign a QA review status to a dataset.

200.description: Successfully assigned QA review status to dataset.

get.summary: Get the number of unreviewed datasets based on filters.
get.description: Get the number of unreviewed datasets based on filters.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the number of unreviewed datasets.

get.summary: Get relevant meta info on unreviewed datasets.
get.description: Gets a filtered and chronologically ordered list of relevant meta info on unreviewed datasets.

get.summary: Get metadata of QA reports based on filters.
get.description: Get metadata of QA reports based on filters.Users can search for QA reports posted within a specific time frame, posted by specific uploaders,for QA reports with a specific QA status, or for active QA reports only. The filters can be combined.

200.description: Found QA reports for applied filters.
